item.description:
Monthly Nashua video screening

We'll select our video soon, but plan to come no matter what to check out our new video screening parlor!

-------------------

We have a new venue in Nashua at 46 Bridge Street in the rear of a chiropractic office. If you've been in Nashua for a while, you'll know the building as the old Maine Manufacturing Company office. Here's what it looks like: http://goo.gl/maps/2dAI.

Please use the parking in the rear and if that is full, there is some available on the right side of the building.

If you have any folding chairs, please bring one for yourself. We're not sure we'll have enough. Also, plan to bring snacks. We can get this location set up better and better to suit our needs, so come on over so you can check it out and make suggestions.

-------------------

We'll get together at the new place at 7 like we did before, so please come early or be there at 7 so we can get off to a great start at our new location.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the basement room that you access from the rear of the building
item.name: Nashua - monthly video screening
